summary: Updated Vendor Dashboard controller with AJAX handlers (bookingStatistics, revenueOverview), aligned booking statistics partial with Rental design pattern, updated dashboard view structure, added routes for AJAX endpoints, and created dashboard.js file. Also started aligning Admin Salon list page with Rental provider list structure - updated page header, filter/search form order, and added tooltip for booking statistics.
